user_query: I'm planning a study session with my friends and want to create a motivating playlist. Fetch the currently playing song on TuneIn and set it as the first track. Can you also suggest a random word from the 'Education' category to set the tone?

TaskList.description: Fetch the currently playing song on TuneIn to use as the first track of the playlist.
Suggest a random word from the 'Education' category to set the tone for the study session.
